verbs.description: A team of [ARG1: American diplomats] [V: involved] [ARG2: in preparatory discussions with North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of a potential summit between President Donald Trump and the North 's leader Kim Jong Un] left a hotel in Seoul on Tuesday amid speculation that they are resuming the talks .

[ARG0: A team of American diplomats involved in preparatory discussions with North Korea ahead of a potential summit between President Donald Trump and the North 's leader Kim Jong Un] [V: left] [ARG1: a hotel] [ARGM-LOC: in Seoul] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-LOC: amid speculation that they are resuming the talks] .

A team of American diplomats involved in preparatory discussions with North Korea ahead of a potential summit between President Donald Trump and the North 's leader Kim Jong Un left a hotel in Seoul on Tuesday amid speculation that they [V: are] resuming the talks .
